description:
'''All Shall Perish''' is an American [[deathcore]] band from [[Oakland, California]], formed in 2002. The band was signed to [[Nuclear Blast]] and have released four full-length albums through the label. Their latest album, ''[[This Is Where It Ends]],'' was released in 2011.

All Shall Perish are noted for being one of the earliest pioneering bands in the deathcore genre.
